title: Soccer Equity, Golf Controversy and Coach K Pay Day
itunes:title: Soccer Equity, Golf Controversy and Coach K Pay Day
description:
Join Michael Barr and Scarlet Fu on Wednesday's Business of Sports as they discuss pay equity between the U.S. Women's National Soccer Team and men's team, Saudi Arabian golf organizers poaching former champion Jack Nicklaus and Coach K's most recent salary in his final season as Duke's head coach following a run to the final four before losing to North Carolina. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
